Posts.Content: My 24 year old daughter has been diagnosed with a really rare bc metaplastic, it's grade 3 and 36mm but she's sure she can feel it growing, she had a ct scan over a wk ago and we go for results on Friday, what if it's spread I'm so scared she's my baby I know I need to be strong for her and I'm trying so much but just don't think I'll cope if I know it's metastasised, it's been 3 wks since they diagnosed it and still no plan of treatment, she also needs her eggs freezing before they start chemo but this cancer is aggressiveÂ
Posts.Title: So scared
